values.Name: Kinops Environment Creation Complete
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Congratulations!

Your ${values('Company Name')} kinops environment has been successfully provisioned. The links and information below will allow you to login and start working.

Username: ${values('Email')}

Password: You'll set this the first time you login
Login

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

${vars('Login Link')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Congratulations! Your ${values('Company Name')} kinops environment is ready

values.Name: Kinops Account Created
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Account Created!

We're still in the process of setting up your company's environment. It will take just a few minutes. You'll get an email shortly with login credentials.


In the mean time, to view the status of your environment, request another environment or view your kinops account, click the link below.
Manage Account

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://kinops.io/manage?username=${vars('Username')}&token=${vars('Token')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Your account was successfully created.

values.Name: Kinops Account Already Exists
values.Text Content:
Looks like an account was already created for you. 

Click the link below to login and manage your environment or create a new one. 

https://kinops.io/manage/account

Cheers, The kinops team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Woops!

It looks like you've already created a kinops account. Click the link below to login and manage your environment or create a new one!
Manage Account
Reset Password

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://kinops.io/manage/account

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Looks like you've already created an account

values.Name: Kinops Account Verification
values.Text Content:
Welcome!

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below.

https://manage.kinops.io/submissions/${submission('id')}

Cheers, The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Welcome!

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below.
Confirm Account

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser:

https://manage.kinops.io/submissions/${submission('id')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: Welcome - Please verify your email

values.Name: Default Footer
values.HTML Content: Kinetic Data - 235 East Sixth St. Suite 400 - Saint Paul, MN - 55101

values.Name: Default Header
values.HTML Content: We're thrilled to have you here! Get ready to dive into your new account.

values.Name: Kinops Environment Repair Complete
values.Text Content:
Your ${vars('Space Name')} kinops environment ${values('Space Slug')} has been successfully repaired. The links and information below will allow you to login and start working.

${vars('Space Link')}

Cheers,

The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Header without pretext')}

Congratulations!

Your ${vars('Space Name')} kinops environment ${values('Space Slug')} has been successfully repaired. The links and information below will allow you to login and start working.

${vars('Space Link')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: kinops space slug (${values('Space Slug')}) repair complete

values.Name: Kinops Environment Repair Unfulfilled
values.Text Content:
Your ${vars('Space Name')} kinops environment ${values('Space Slug')} could not be repaired. This environment has been marked as unrepairable.

${vars('Space Link')}

Cheers,

The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Repair Unfulfilled

Your ${vars('Space Name')} kinops environment ${values('Space Slug')} could not be repaired. This environment has been marked as unrepairable.

${vars('Space Link')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: kinops space slug (${values('Space Slug')}) repair failed

values.Name: Team empty
values.Text Content: kinops team ${vars('Team Name')} for space ${vars('Space Name')} now has no members. Tasks and approvals assigned meant to be assigned to this team will be assigned to the default teams set up until new members are added.
values.Subject: Warning: Team ${vars('Team Name')} now has no members

values.Name: Kinops Environment Decommission Complete
values.Text Content:
Your kinops environment space slug ${values('Space Slug')} has been decommissioned.

Cheers,

The kinops Team
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Header without pretext')}

Decommission Complete

Your kinops environment space slug ${values('Space Slug')} has been decommissioned.

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: kinops space slug ${values('Space Slug')} has been decommissioned

label: Kinops Environment Creation Did Not Complete

values.Name: Kinops Environment Creation Did Not Complete
values.HTML Content:
${snippet('Default Header')}

Space Failed to Provision

${vars('Space Name')} kinops environment ${vars('Space Slug')} did not finish provisioning after ${vars('Notification Delay')} minutes. Please investigate using details listed below.

Space Name: ${vars('Space Name')}

Space Slug: ${vars('Space Slug')}

Manage Task Engine Run Id: ${vars('Run Id')}

Requester Name: ${vars('Requester Name')}

Requester Email: ${vars('Requester Email')}

AWS Provisioner Info: ${vars('AWS Info')}

Cheers,
The kinops Team
${snippet('Default Footer')}
values.Subject: kinops space slug (${vars('Space Slug')}) did not finish provisioning

values.Name: Header without pretext
Tenant Space Email Header
values.HTML Content:
kinops System Alert

kinops

values.Name: Tenant Space Email Footer
values.HTML Content: Sent from the kinops Management Team

values.Name: Start
values.HTML Content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title></title>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
<style type="text/css">
/* CLIENT-SPECIFIC STYLES */
body, table, td, a { -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; }
table, td { mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; }
img { -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; }

/* RESET STYLES */
img { border: 0; height: auto; line-height: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; }
table { border-collapse: collapse !important; }
body { height: 100% !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; width: 100% !important; }

/* iOS BLUE LINKS */
a[x-apple-data-detectors] {
    color: inherit !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
    font-size: inherit !important;
    font-family: inherit !important;
    font-weight: inherit !important;
    line-height: inherit !important;
}

/* MEDIA QUERIES */
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
    .mobile-hide {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .mobile-center {
        text-align: center !important;
    }
}

/* ANDROID CENTER FIX */
div[style*="margin: 16px 0;"] { margin: 0 !important; }
</style>

<style type="text/css">

</style>
</head>
<body style="margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; background-color: #eeeeee;" bgcolor="#eeeeee">

values.Name: Signature
values.HTML Content:
Love,
The kinops Team
